Event.name: Retaining
Event.definition:
<def-root>In this frame an <fen>Agent</fen> continues to possess a <fen>Theme</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen> of time. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Place">In her heart</fex> <fex name="Agent">she</fex> must <t>retain</t> <fex name="Theme">bitterness against those who had killed him</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>kept</t> <fex name="Theme">the iPhone Sally gave me</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>At all times <fex name="Agent">the Saxon government</fex> <t>held</t> <t>on</t> <t>to</t> its insistently practiced political tradition. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity which the <fen>Agent</fen> possesses for a <fen>Duration</fen>.
<ex>Once you've got a War Bond, <t>hang</t> <t>on</t> <t>to</t> <fex name="Theme">it</fex> for the full ten years of its life.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Agent</fen> is in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>The man who hates his life will <t>keep</t> it <fex name="Dur">for eternal life</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> keeps the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>He will <t>retain</t> <fex name="Place">in his heart</fex> the memory of the vast Holocaust.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way the <fen>Agent</fen> retains possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>I knew these gifts were not meant to be <t>kept</t> <fex name="Man">selfishly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>Margerite <t>held</t> <t>on</t> <t>to</t> the key <fex name="Time">on Wednesday</fex> until I returned to pick it up.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The means by which the <fen>Agent</fen> retains the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>If Britian had focused on India, could it have <t>retained</t> it <fex name="Means">by force</fex>?</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: retain.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to continuously have possession of item of emotion

lexUnit.name: keep.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to retain possession of an item or feeling

lexUnit.name: hold on to.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to retain possession of an entity or emotion

lexUnit.name: hang on to.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to keep possion of an item or an emotion
